artist: Artist: Itō Shinsui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: portrait; head and torso of woman in profile from PL, wearing white, pink, purple and blue garment and green stone ring; pink blossoms at top
inscription: 昭和八年三月 {Shōwa hachinen sangatsu} (March 1933)
markings: red artist\'s seal: 深水 {Shinsui} | LRC: publisher seal: \\ワタナベ {Watanabe} | LR: publisher seal: 版権所有　渡邊庄三郎 {hanken shoyū Watanabe Shōzaburō} (copyright Watanabe Shōzaburō) | on back, red seal: 貮百五拾枚絶版　第貮百四拾四番 {nihyakugojū mai zeppan, dai nihyakuyonjūyon ban} (edition of 250, number 244) | red square publisher seal: わたなべ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Second Collection of Modern Beauties (Gendai bijin shū dai nishū 現代美人集第二輯)
text: No. 19 in the series (envelop says 第十九　紅梅).
title: Pink Plum Blossoms
